subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: N.H.L. Commissioner Gary Bettman said each team would play every other team at least once next season. The announcement came Saturday before Game 1 of the Stanley Cup finals between Pittsburgh and Detroit, which did not meet during the regular season because of an unbalanced schedule. Bettman also said in his annual news conference before the finals that the size of goaltenders’ equipment would be analyzed during the off-season.
